Package ru.nsu.fit.tsukanov.recordBook.core

Class Semester

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.tsukanov.recordBook.core.Semester
public class Semester extends Object
The class that contains subjects and number of this semester. This class is used for data storage for record book.
See Also:
RecordBook, Subject

      public boolean addSubject​(Subject subject)
      Add the subject to the list of subjects. If there is no the same subjects, then specified subject will be added.
      Parameters:
      subject - the semester that will be added into list of semesters
      Returns:
      true if subject was added
